means: 实现，实施( actualize的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_cn: 他最终实现了自己的梦想。

sentence.Network_en: Method All kinds of monkey hernia were diagnosed and actualized surgical operation.
sentence.Network_cn: 方法各种猕猴疝经确诊,实施手术治疗.

sentence.Network_en: Invest in yourself. Material things come to those that have self actualized.
sentence.Network_cn: 往自己身上投资,功成名就了婚姻自然会来.
